name.ja: <ruby>鋼<rt>こう</rt></ruby><ruby>鉄<rt>てつ</rt></ruby><ruby>馬<rt>ば</rt></ruby>マーチン・ヴァイナリー

effect.en: Toss a coin a number of times equal to [the number of face-up monsters on your opponent's field]. If at least 1 of the results is heads, this card can attack twice this turn. Also, if the 3 results are heads, this card inflicts piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference), if it attacks a Defense Position monster this turn.
